reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and is comfortable, with a classic style that looks expensive. The material is sturdy and decent, while the color receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it pairs well with black heels. They appreciate how the dress flatters their curves, with the ruching accentuating the right areas, and effectively hides belly rolls. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase, quality fabric
items.body: The dress fit well. I'm 179lbs and 5"5". I could have worn a large, but I wanted to be sure it didn't gape at the thigh or come up too high. It came down to my knee. It has a lot of stretch and give all over. I have a large chest (38J) and it accommodate my size very well. It's stunning. I didn't have time to swap it for a large because I bought it for a specific occasion and would not have had chance to get a new one. It looks good and I am comfortable with it. The colors a deep forest green. It pair well with my brown eyes. I love the fabric and it has a high quality feel. It will last a while with proper care. I'll probably dry clean it occasionally. Read more
items.author: Brenda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved this dress!
items.body: I wore this to a September wedding. It is true to size. Fit curves in the right places. Loved the shimmery color. I thought it may be itchy but it was not, it was very comfortable. Not sure how the length would be for someone taller Yes, did feel sexy in it Read more
items.author: Km

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, but arrived smelling of smoke.
items.body: I received this dress today and it fits like a glove. So beautiful. I am 5’3” and 122lbs. I ordered size medium, which is the recommended Amazon size and it was perfect. The fabric was soft but substantial, not see-through. The ruching stayed in place and was very complementary to my figure. I am giving the dress itself five stars however obviously somebody else had tried this on previously that is a smoker. It came to me unzipped, balled up in a torn plastic bag, wrinkled and smelly. I need this dress ASAP and will keep it but I’m not happy with how it arrived. I was thinking about buying additional dresses from the same company, however I am wondering if it will arrive in good condition. Do returned items get inspected before being sent back out? Read more
items.author: Irene

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits great
items.body: Love the way this fits! 5’6 160lbs, it is lined and not very see through (the white is a tiny bit sheer no colored bras!) very nice for a dressy evening, the V neck is sexy low but not too low. The length is respectable and the style makes the hem cute. Very forgiving for us girls with a mommy pouch. I will add a star and order a second one if I can unwrinkle it and wear it without any loose seams. Here’s hoping! Read more
items.author: Daphne Katz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for any dressy affair!
items.body: This dress exceeded expectations for me. The fit was perfect and it was super-comfortable! It's a little stretchy so that makes it comfortable to even wear with Spanx. I ordered the black and selected an XL, which was my size according to Amazon, and a Large. The LG was perfect. I work it with a sheer shawl and it was perfect for the wedding I attended. Looks way more expensive than it is, and you can wash it. Great buy! Read more
items.author: U. City Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: Wore this to a wedding and I was absolutely in love! The only thing was the slot up the middle kept riding up because of the shape wear I was wearing underneath. Other than that the material is great, it’s worth the money, and the style is very flattering! Washing was easy and so was putting it on. Fabric was comfy as well Read more
items.author: Addison

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Weird extra fabric makes it look frumpy
items.body: This dress would have been SO CUTE except there's this weird extra fabric that sticks out on the side and makes it look frumpy. The rest of the dress fits perfectly, so I know it isn't a body shape deal, it's a design deal. Such a bummer as the dress was gorgeous! Read more
items.author: borderrat906

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress with a great flattering fit.
items.body: This dress has a great fit and is very flattering. I love the shape and design. I don't have a great picture of it but I did end up wearing it to an event. Quality material, does not wrinkle easily. Read more
items.author: DL

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless Bodycon Cocktail Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless Bodycon Cocktail Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Nude-pink, Sequin-black, Wine-red, Rose-red, Glitter-navy, Rust-red, Glitter-purple, Black, Light-blue, Glitter-peacock-blue, Army-green, Grey-blue, Red, Royal-blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
